ai-patthana14.2:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma ladies that are difficult for the living, etc.,
ai-patthana14.2:1.1_0: Only cause or reason, without cause or condition.
ai-patthana14.2:1.1_1: only cause or reasons not give rise to cause or reason.
ai-patthana14.2:1.1_2: Experiential causes and reasons not arise for the sake of a cause or reason,
ai-patthana14.2:2.1_0: Only cause or reason, without cause or condition.
ai-patthana14.2:2.1_1: Only only cause or reason it doesn’t give rise to cause or reason.
ai-patthana14.2:2.1_2: Experiential causes and reasons not give rise to cause or reason,
ai-patthana14.2:3.1_0: A cause or condition for the sake of cause and reason, without cause,
ai-patthana14.2:3.1_1: A cause or condition for the sake of cause and reason, without cause,
ai-patthana14.2:3.1_2: Thoughts that are cause and reasoned with cause and reason, without cause,
ai-patthana14.2:3.1_3: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana14.2:4.1_0: ‘... for the sake of nine objects.’ ...
ai-patthana14.2:4.1_3: You should get close to a question.
